resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104882</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104882</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205879</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Dan Flavin: A Retrospective</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dan Flavin: Ein Zurückblickendes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dan Flavin : Un Rétrospectif</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dan Flavin: Um Retrospective</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dan Flavin: Un Retrospettivo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Δαν Flavin: Μια ρετροσπεκτίβα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dan Flavin: Un Retrospectivo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">looks at works and the life of an artist whose career-long exploration of light established him as a progenitor and chief exponent of minimalism. His use of fluorescent light is featured in this exhibit, the first comprehensive retrospective on one of the most influential artists of the late 20th century.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Blicke auf Arbeiten und das Leben eines Künstlers
dessen Karriere-lange Erforschung des Lichtes ihn als Vorfahr- und 
Leiterexponent des Minimalismus herstellte. Sein Gebrauch von 
Leuchtstofflicht wird in dieser Ausstellung, das erste komplette 
zurückblickende auf einem der einflußreichsten Künstler des späten
20. Jahrhunderts gekennzeichnet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">regards aux travaux et la vie d'un artiste dont la
carrière-longue exploration de la lumière l'a établi comme exposant
d'ancêtre et de chef de minimalisme. Son utilisation de 
lumière fluorescente est décrite dans cet objet exposé, le premier 
rétrospectif complet sur un des artistes les plus influents du 20ème
siècle en retard.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">olhares em trabalhos e a vida de um artista cuja a
exploração carreira-longa da luz o estabelecesse como um exponente 
do progenitor e do chefe do minimalism. Seu uso da luz 
fluorescente é caracterizado nesta exibição, o primeiro 
retrospective detalhado em um dos artistas os mais influential do 20o 
século atrasado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sguardi agli impianti e la vita di un artista di 
cui l'esplorazione carriera-lunga di luce lo ha stabilito come 
esponente del capo e del progenitor di minimalism. Il suo uso di
luce fluorescente è descritto in questa esposizione, il primo 
retrospettivo completo su uno degli artisti più influenti del 
ventesimo secolo tardo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξετάζει τις εργασίες και τη ζωή ενός καλλιτέχνη η ο 
οποίος σταδιοδρομία-μακριά εξερεύνηση του φωτός τον καθιέρωσε ως
πρόγονο και προϊστάμενος εκθέτη του μινιμαλισμός. Η χρήση 
φθορισμού φωτός του χαρακτηρίζεται σε αυτό το έκθεμα, η πρώτη 
περιεκτική ρετροσπεκτίβα σε ένας από τους επιδρύτερους 
καλλιτέχνες του πρόσφατου 20ού αιώνα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">miradas en los trabajos y la vida de un artista 
que exploración carrera-larga de la luz lo estableció como exponente
del progenitor y del jefe del minimalism. Su uso de la luz 
fluorescente se ofrece en este objeto expuesto, el primer 
retrospectivo comprensivo en uno de los artistas más influyentes del 
último vigésimo siglo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205879</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104882</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/dan-flavin-a-retrospective</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
